Interface EmployeeDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmployeeDAOImpl
public interface EmployeeDAO
EmployeeDAO defines the operations to be performed on the Employee data model. It serves as an abstraction for CRUD operations and authentication mechanisms.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Employee>
    getAllEmployee()
    Retrieves a list of all employees from the database.
    Employee
    getEmployee(String username)
    Retrieves a specific employee record based on username.
    boolean
    isAuthenticated(String username, String password)
    Authenticates the user by checking the provided credentials against the database.
    boolean
    save(Employee employee)
    Saves a new employee's credentials and profile data into the database.

  • Method Details

    • save

      boolean save(Employee employee)
      Saves a new employee's credentials and profile data into the database.
      Parameters:
      employee - The Employee object to be saved.
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise.

    • getAllEmployee

      List<Employee> getAllEmployee()
      Retrieves a list of all employees from the database.
      Returns:
      A List of Employee objects.

    • getEmployee

      Employee getEmployee(String username)
      Retrieves a specific employee record based on username.
      Parameters:
      username - The unique username of the employee.
      Returns:
      An Employee object if found, null otherwise.

    • isAuthenticated

      boolean isAuthenticated(String username, String password)
      Authenticates the user by checking the provided credentials against the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The entered username.
      password - The entered password.
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful, false otherwise.
